entry.summary: Re The only pool that is live atm is a multi-asset pool meaning that akthough you can deposit only one token (e.g $WBTC, $USDC or $ETH) you will be exposed to all three. However, you will get the same amounts out as you put in.

entry.summary: 🚨 CONFIRMED AIRDROP 🚨 @SwaapFinance is a DEX on @0xPolygon pioneering a new AMM model using oracles and dynamic fees. It eliminates impermanent loss for LP's of high-volume assets like $ETH, $WBTC etc. by quoting the spot prices on centralized exchanges. Market neutral yield

entry.summary: 🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨 @SturdyFinance is a lending platform with a focus on interest-bearing collateral. E.g you can deposit Curve sUSD LP tokens earning 10% APY and then borrow $USDC or $DAI against that same collateral at 0% borrow cost. Why 0%? 👇
